mapper.select: SELECT A.ID RoomID, A.Room RoomName, A.RoomCode, A.HuXing RoomType, A.Floor RommFloor, IsNull(A.West, '') RoomOrientation, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), A.BldArea) + '㎡' BldArea, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), A.TnArea) + '㎡' TnArea, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), A.Price, 1) + '元' BldPrice, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), A.TnPrice, 1) + '元' TnPrice, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), A.Total, 1) + '元' Total, CASE WHEN EditTime IS NULL THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), CreateTime, 120) ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), EditTime, 120) END UpdateTime FROM B_Room A WHERE A.ID = #{RoomID} AND A.SaleStatus = '未售' AND A.Status = 1 AND A.IsDel = 0
